title: 👨‍💻 Syntax
desc: A Tasty Treats Podcast for Web Developers. Hosted by Wes Bos and Scott Tolinski.
author: Wes Bos & Scott Tolinski

title: ⚔️ Hardcore History
desc: No one has ever explained me a historical event like Dan. His passion for history will make you stick to each and every one of his very very long episodes.
author: Dan Carlin

title: 👨‍🏫 Yuval Noah Harari's Blog
desc: Prof. Yuval Noah Harari is the bestselling author of Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind, Homo Deus: A Brief History of Tomorrow, and 21 Lessons for the 21st Century.
author: Yuval Noah Harari

title: 🧘‍♂️ Cal Newport's Blog
desc: Cal writes about the intersection of technology and society. He focuses on the impact of new technologies on our ability to perform productive work, as well as on our ability to lead interesting and satisfying lives.
author: Cal Newport

title: 👨‍🎨 Wait But Why
desc: WBW is a blog founded by Tim Urban and Andrew Finn and written and illustrated by Urban. The blog includes long-form discussions of various topics, including artificial intelligence, space, and procrastination.
author: Tim Urban

title: 🧙 JavaScript Weekly Newsletter
desc: A free, once–weekly email roundup of JavaScript news and articles.
author: Cooper Press

title: ⚛️ React.js Newsletter
desc: The free, weekly newsletter of the best React news, articles, projects, and more - brought to you by Tyler McGinnis.
author: Tyler McGinnis

title: ⚛ React Status Newsletter
desc: A weekly roundup of the latest React and React Native links and tutorials.
author: Cooper Press

title: 🍯 JAMstacked Newsletter
desc: An email update on the evolving JAMstack ecosystem.
author: Brian Rinaldi
